markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cheetah's Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3302)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed for the listed duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +5 feet, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +10 feet, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cheetah's Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 110 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +10 feet, and the duration is 1 hour.
name: Cheetah's Elixir (Lesser)
